website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive solution, Tilex works wonders for slaughtering mold across a wide range of surfaces while brightening every ceramic tile you treat.
pros: Formula kills 99.99% of mold and mildew
Wipes out mold and mildew stains
Optimized for ceramic, plastic, and many other surfaces
cons: Must be sprayed in a well-ventilated area due to its strong fumes

customer_reviews.title: Two SMALL Bottles Are Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: While the product arrived early, this was a case of price gouging. Two small size bottles were sold. at a high price for two large. I need these as I had run out, so will keep the product. But beware. This is NOT a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on these mini bottles. Rip off to the max
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Tilex has always been the best product for mold & mildew
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product defective
customer_reviews.text: When I received these, they where leaking a bit and the top was broke. When I spray them my hand gets soaked with Tilex and I have to hold the top on. Would not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! I did not know what to do or where to go for this item. It is the only cleaner that really takes out the grime and mold without having to struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Tellez-Gil

customer_reviews.title: Spilled
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that some of the tilex bottle was spilled a little bit from one of them. It spilled onto the other thing that I ordered, bag and box
customer_reviews.author: Moises anzures

customer_reviews.title: Rip off! Over priced!
customer_reviews.text: AND this was not the foam that I am accustomed too..!
customer_reviews.author: Dedra

customer_reviews.title: make sure that lids are on tight.
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles leaked in box. Appears to behalf gone.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia b.

customer_reviews.title: Not lavender scented!
customer_reviews.text: Received leaking in the box. This smells like regular Clorox bleach. No lavender scent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda D

customer_reviews.title: Works great on the shower.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product my wife will use in our shower.
customer_reviews.author: JTP
